Sentencas: There is interest in developing solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) operated directly with liquid fuels such as methanol.
Titulo: Importance of pyrolysis and catalytic decomposition for the direct utilization of methanol in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This mode of operation increases the complexity of the anodic processes, since thermal and catalytic decomposition reactions are relevant.
Titulo: Importance of pyrolysis and catalytic decomposition for the direct utilization of methanol in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this study, the pyrolysis and catalytic decomposition of methanol are investigated experimentally for conditions typical of SOFC.
Titulo: Importance of pyrolysis and catalytic decomposition for the direct utilization of methanol in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results are compared to the thermodynamic equilibrium values and also to the predictions of a kinetics model.
Titulo: Importance of pyrolysis and catalytic decomposition for the direct utilization of methanol in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The main species of the thermal decomposition of methanol are H-2, CO, and HCHO; soot formation is relevant below 973 K.
Titulo: Importance of pyrolysis and catalytic decomposition for the direct utilization of methanol in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The presence of a catalyst allows the gas-phase composition to reach equilibrium.
Titulo: Importance of pyrolysis and catalytic decomposition for the direct utilization of methanol in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, the catalysts tested - Ni/YSZ, Ni/CeO2, Cu/CeO2 and Cu-Co/CeO2 - deactivate by coking so that the gas-phase composition reverts to that of pyrolysis alone.
Titulo: Importance of pyrolysis and catalytic decomposition for the direct utilization of methanol in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results presented reveal part of the complex dynamics occurring within the anode compartment during the direct utilization of methanol.
